address.Common.Line1: Unit B Chancel Close Industrial Estate

Common.ActualAddress.Common.Line1: Unit B Chancel Close Industrial Estate

Common.PostalAddresses.Common.Line1: Unit B Chancel Close Industrial Estate

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
Chancel Close is a high profile industrial/trade counter location situated with immediate access to Eastern Avenue where a number of the major trade counter operators are based.

Eastern Avenue provides excellent transport links to both the city centre, 2 miles to the north, and to the M5 motorway junctions 11 and 11a which are 3 miles to the east.

Notable trade counter occupiers in the immediate area include Magnet, Toolstation, Howdens and Screwfix.

The property comprises a mid-terraced industrial unit of steel frame construction under a clad roof and is to be fully refurbished.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
Chancel Close is a high profile industrial/ trade counter location situated with immediate access to Eastern Avenue where a number of the major trade counter operators are based. Eastern Avenue provides excellent transport links to both the city centre, 2 miles to the north, and to the M5 motorway junctions 11 and 11a which are 3 miles to the east. Notable trade counter occupiers in the immediate area include Magnet, Toolstation, Howdens and Screwfix.

The property comprises a mid-terraced industrial unit of steel frame construction under a recently overclad roof. The property has been fully refurbished.

Dynamic.PrimaryImage.Common.ImageCaption: UNIT 3_ CHANCEL CLOSE INDUSTRIAL ESTATE - MAIN

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
Location

COMPAS5 offers excellent access to J9 of the M5 via the A46 and is situated within the well-established and highly accessible Ashchurch employment area.

+ M5 North to Worcester, Birmingham, M42 & West Midlands
+ Access to South Midlands and the M40 via the A46
+ M5 South to Gloucester / Cheltenham, Bristol, M4 and South West
+ M50 to South Wales via M5 J8

Description

+ Significant detached triple bay distribution / warehouse facility
+ Steel truss frame construction to main 3 bay warehouse with 6m clear internal height, and steel profile metal sheet clad elevations
+ Additional steel portal frame construction modern warehouse extension with 7.8m clear internal height, and steel profile metal sheet clad elevations
+ Loading bay extension provides seven double width dock level loading bays and two ground level loading doors
+ A further eight ground level loading doors serve the property with loading access on four elevations
+ Two Storey Offices, welfare and canteen accommodation serve the main warehouse
+ An additional two storey office block sits adjacent the entrance and alongside the modern warehouse extension
+ Extensive concrete yard areas and trailer parking serving three elevations, with a large separate car parking area serving the office accommodation
+ We understand that mains services are provided to the property including water, drainage, gas, and 3 phase electricity
+ EPC Rating C 62

Travel Distances

+ 0.25 miles – A46
+ 0.30 miles – Ashchurch for Tewkesbury Railway Station
+ 1 mile – J9 of the M5 motorway
+ 2.6 miles – Tewkesbury Town Centre
+ 4.8 miles – M50 motorway
+ 9.5 miles – Cheltenham
+ 15.1 miles – Gloucester
+ 47.2 miles – Bristol
+ 52.1 miles – Birmingham
+ 103.3 miles – London

Common.FloorPlans.Common.ImageCaption: FORMAL INDUSTRIAL PARK_ UNIT D1 - SITE PLAN

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
Location

Unit D1 is situated within the well-established and highly accessible Ashchurch employment area with excellent access to the M5 motorway via the A46, east of the M5 and Tewkesbury, and within walking distance of Ashchurch railway station. Other nearby occupiers include DHL, XPO Logistics, Moog, Babcock, Intamarque, Idemia, Lakes Bathrooms, and Trackwise.

Description

Unit D1 is a modern end-terrace warehouse / light industrial unit with the below specifications;

+ Steel portal frame construction, with brick and profile steel elevations
+ Electrically operated sectional roller shutter loading door, measuring 4.39m wide by 4.05m high
+ 6.5m eaves height, 5.5m minimum clear height, 7.3m at the apex
+ Insulated profile sheet pitched roof, with 10% translucent roof panels
+ Mezzanine storage area, with 2.77m clear height beneath
+ Incorporating ground floor WC / kitchenette accommodation
+ Separate double-glazed pedestrian entrance door
+ Front loading apron and 5 dedicated marked parking spaces (including one disabled space)
+ Water, drainage and 3 phase electricity
+ EPC rating C 67

Travel Distances

+ 0.30 miles (0.50 km) to Ashchurch Railway Station
+ 1 mile (1.60 km) to Junction 9 of the M5 motorway
+ 2.60 miles (4.20 km) to Tewkesbury town centre
+ 9.50 miles (15.30 km) to Cheltenham
+ 15.10 miles (24.30 km) to Gloucester
+ 47.20 miles (75.90 km) to Bristol
+ 52.10 miles (83.90 km) to Birmingham
+ 103.30 miles (166.20 km) to London
